name: Tribe's Tale
description:
Tribe's Tale is a small arcadey game about growing your tribe by collecting food in a randomly generated prehistoric land.

Collect berries and fruit and hunt animals to get enough food for the day in order to grow your tribe. But watch out, large tribes require a lot of food to keep going and people may start leaving if you can't provide for them.

Controls -

WASD - Move
Space - Attack
